Comparing valid_from and valid_to together requires both fields to be assigned first, so this is best suited for @model_validator

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9394
activity.text:
> Currently, notifications are dispatched via functions exported from [Notifications.js](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/blob/develop/src/Utils/Notifications.js).
> 
> Since we are slowly moving towards using shadcn's UI components, let's switch to using shadcn's sonner for notifications.
> 
> https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/sonner
> 
> Here's an example of the Toaster component added to the `App.tsx` file (to ensure colours are as expected).
> 
> [care_fe/src/App.tsx](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/blob/e48d37c6867675412f2f8ff6d9f635f2dc3c7ad7/src/App.tsx#L38-L45)
> 
> Lines 38 to 45 in [e48d37c](/ohcnetwork/care_fe/commit/e48d37c6867675412f2f8ff6d9f635f2dc3c7ad7)
> 
>  <Toaster 
>    position="top-right" 
>    theme="light" 
>    richColors 
>    // Voluntarily passing empty object as a workaround for `richColors` 
>    // to work. Refer: https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/issues/2234. 
>    toastOptions={{}} 
>  /> 
> Here's the full attempt diff for reference: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/9350/files
> 
> ### Action Items
> * [ ]  Install [Sonner](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/sonner) from shadcn-ui.[ ]  Remove existing shadcn's Toaster to avoid conflicts with Sonner. Sonner support positioning without needing to write custom CSS. (i.e.: [toast.tsx](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/blob/develop/src/components/ui/toast.tsx), [toaster.tsx](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/blob/develop/src/components/ui/toaster.tsx), [useToast](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/blob/develop/src/hooks/useToast.ts))[ ]  Update functions in [Notifications.js](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/blob/develop/src/Utils/Notifications.js) functions to instead trigger the `toast` of sonner instead of from `pnotify` library.[ ]  Uninstall `pnotify` and related packages.[ ]  Add development docs on: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/docs/tree/master/docs/care/development.

>

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9267
activity.text:
> Let's switch to using `useInfiniteQuery` hook as implemented in #9190 similar to how `useDebounce` was copied over. Do make sure changes its copied exactly as is to avoid merge conflicts.

Thank you for the suggestion. You're absolutely right that KanbanBoardType<T> is redundant since it's exactly the same as KanbanBoardProps<T>. I'll remove KanbanBoardType<T> and directly reuse KanbanBoardProps<T> to keep the code clean and consistent.
